title: The Kova
text: A website I made for a restaurant in New York City. I took all the photos on the website and added  menu, location, and contact sections.

title: Split Calculator
text: A web application meant for splitting group expenses

title: Elderly
text: Videochat designed and created for the elderly. Coded in Node.js, Express, HTML, and CSS.

title: Fresh Mangoes
text: A movies and TV review website based off of Rotten Tomatoes. Built in Java, React, MySQL, HTML, and CSS.

title: Pokemon Bot
text: Artificial intelligence bot that challenges players on pokemonshowdown.com in real time. Built with Java and Selenium.
